MICHEL1.original: Many of your friends have special abilities that they'll use to help you, should they like you enough.
MICHEL1.translated: 你的许多朋友都有特殊的能力，如果他们够喜欢你，就会用能力帮你。

MICHEL1.original: These range from delivering guns to providing bombs to help you get those hard-to-reach targets.
MICHEL1.translated: 从提供枪支到提供炸弹，帮你解决那些难以接近的目标。

MICHEL1.original: Each friend and girlfriend you have will have their favorite and least favorite activities.
MICHEL1.translated: 你的每个朋友和女友都会有他们最喜欢和最讨厌的活动。

MICHEL1.original: Many of your friends have special abilities that they'll use to help you, should they like you enough.
MICHEL1.translated: 你的许多朋友都有特殊的能力，如果他们够喜欢你，就会用能力帮你。

MICHEL1.original: Go to a bar or club, where you can enjoy a few drinks.
MICHEL1.translated: 去酒吧或者俱乐部，喝上几杯快活快活。

MICHEL1.original: Playing games, and watching cabaret shows or stand up comedy acts.
MICHEL1.translated: 玩游戏，看歌舞表演或单口喜剧。

MICHEL1.original: Watch a cabaret show or a stand up act.
MICHEL1.translated: 观看歌舞表演或单口喜剧。

MICHEL1.original: Each friend and girlfriend you have will have their favorite and least favorite activities.
MICHEL1.translated: 你的每个朋友和女朋友都会有他们最喜欢和最不喜欢的活动。

MICHEL1.original: You will make friends and meet girlfriends as you spend time in Liberty City. You will be able to partake in a variety of activities with them, like eating...
MICHEL1.translated: 你会在自由城结识朋友，交到女友。你们可以一起进行各种活动，比如下馆子...

MICHEL1.original: You will make friends and meet girlfriends as you spend time in Liberty City. You will be able to partake in a variety of activities with them.
MICHEL1.translated: 你会在自由城结识朋友，交到女友。你们可以一起进行各种活动。

MICHEL1.original: There are many different types of restaurant around the city where you can take them for food.
MICHEL1.translated: 城里有许多不同类型的餐馆，你可以带他们去搓一顿。

MICHEL1.original: ~s~Be careful with Michelle's car or the date will be over.
MICHEL1.translated: ~s~当心Michelle的车，否则约会就结束了。
